		<div id="header_profilecorner">

			Attention: you are not using the latest Firefox Tracker add-on.

<div class="tabs">
	<ul id="primary">
	<li class="tab_avatar"><a href="/Manfred" id="tab_avatar" title="Home of Manfred" class=""><img src="/img/User/002/1030/32x32_A899977ab.jpg" width="32" height="32" alt="Manfred" />me</a></li>	<li><a href="/Manfred/timeline" id="" title="Music activity" class="">music activity</a></li><li><a href="/recommendations/index" id="standard_tabs_tab_recommended" title="Your recommended tracks" class="">recommended</a></li><li><a href="/Manfred/library" id="" title="Stored tracks" class="">library</a></li></ul><ul id="primary_right"><li><a href="/heavyrotation/profile/Manfred" id="" title="Most played tracks" class="">heavy rotation</a></li><li><a href="/Manfred/friends" id="" title="Fans and friends" class="">friends</a></li></ul></div>
<hr class="orangeborder" />
<div id="settingswrap">

		<h3>It looks like you successfully installed the Firefox ad-on. Congrats!</h3>
		<p>Remember that Twones Is still early stage and private at the moment while we're improving it even more. Meaning everything isn't quite working exactly the way it should. So there might be a few bugs and errors in there.
		Please be a little patient and all feedback is very welcome!</p>
		<h1 class="green">The twones basics / how does it work</h1>
		<br />
		<div class="after_install_item">
			<p><strong>1)</strong> You have installed the Firefox plug-in. The plug-in aggregates and collects everything you play on the web (from YouTube to MySpace) or offline on your computer (such as iTunes) to your music activity stream.  You are ready to go from now.</p>
		</div>
		<div class="after_install_item">
			<p><strong>2)</strong> Twones is more fun with your buddies and heroes. Start adding some friends and become a fan. From now on you receive their music plays from all over the web  without the need to visit their profiles one by one.</p>
		</div>
		<div class="after_install_item">
			<p><strong>3)</strong> Discover relevant new music and new music services via your buddies and heroes you never heard of. Play it, talk about it, agree, disagree.</p>
		</div>
		<div class="after_install_item">
			<p><strong>4)</strong> Bookmark and organize ALL your music!  Including music you have played on the web (YouTube, MySpace etc) in your personal library like you own it!</p>
			<br /><br />
			<p class="after_install_noinline">There is a lot more to Twones, but you will find that out yourself. Check out our up-and coming page for new features or give us feedback what you would like to see!</p>
		</div>
	
	<div class="submit_input">
		<a href="/">
			<div class="submit_button">
				I want to give TWONES a spin!
			</div>
		</a>
	</div>
	</div>
</div>
